summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting the creation of a folder and addition of attached notes, likely related to case material management.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document is an email dated May 13, 2021.
It originates from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email requests the creation of a folder and addition of attached notes, indicating case material management.
The subject references 'NTW Material', which may relate to case evidence or notes.
